entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • osx-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono_Minijit_RuntimeTests minijit build leg fails to build with an error referencing a macosx12.0 #114248
  • Interlocked.CompareExchange<UInt128> Does Not Work on ARM64 (Mac M1) #114247
  • The 'wasi-experimental' workload is not supported in .NET 9 #114236
    Future
  • CI flakiness: iOS builds failing with SDK errors #114235
  • [browser] EP testing #114232
    10.0.0
  • File.Move (overwrite) unreliable because FileShare.Delete access of target file ignored #114230
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' during 'Importation' #114229
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] GC Large array test failure #114222
  • Console APIs missing `[UnsupportedOSPlatform("wasi")]` #114221
    Future
  • Help Needed: Error NU1101 While Building Custom ODBC Wrapper #114220
  • c0000005 at SHA256.HashData #114219
  • [android] EventPipe loader events on CoreCLR Android mixes relative/absolute paths. #114217
  • [android] Nettrace collected on CoreCLR Android including JIT+Loader events won't display in Perfview Loader/JITStats views. #114216
  • JIT: `InstanceBasedFunctionPointer(useExplicitThis: True)` test fails with tailcallstress #114213
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `IsVNConstantBound(vn) || IsVNConstantBoundUnsigned(vn)` during 'Assertion prop' #114212
  • Apple Sillicon Rosetta2 .NET9 deadlock #114206
  • JIT: See if we can/should replace heap class layouts by custom layouts #114205
  • JIT: We can remove `getTypeForBoxOnStack` #114204
  • [Question] Need help obtaining assembly dependencies #114202
  • [mobile] Replace `<TrimMode>link</TrimMode>` in mobile targets #114198
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Mark DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.All as EditorBrowsable(Never) #114197
  • 在一个EXE应用程序中调用多个由.NET9 AOT发布的动态库so文件会引发异常 #114193
  • [API Proposal]: change 'Unsafe.AsPointer' parameter to be 'ref readonly' #114189

Closed

  • App WPF .NET 9.0.3 x64 portable error WMI in Windows 8.1 #114118
  • [API Proposal]: Enable easier comparisons across and within StringSegment instances #114239
  • Atomic<T> for primitive types in .NET #114242
  • PackedSimd fails to find interpreter intrinsic #114088
    10.0.0
  • StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase abnormal behavior on some OS #114208
  • .NET Runtime - missing correct version! #114175
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests timeout #114177
  • Test failure: JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/LocallocCnstB5_ro/LocallocCnstB5_ro.dll #114181
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add WaitOneAsync to EventWaitHandle #114199
  • Multiple test failures when connecting to corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net #110578
    10.0.0
  • Linux build fails randomly with "Unable to load shared library 'jitinterface_x64'" error in crossgen #111731
    10.0.0
  • Runtime support for Swift Interop in .NET 10 #108662
    10.0.0
  • [Swift Interop] Lowering fixed buffers #107620
    10.0.0
  • Adding support for fully managed name resolution APIs or as app-level toggle #42185
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/16/2025 11:54:41 PM +00:00 #113936
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT] Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove jitstress-isas-sve pipeline #114245
    needs-area-label
  • Fix the encoding for sve_mov #114244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Add aliases for Vector128.Load and Vector128.LoadUnsafe #114243
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Create error message when `UnmanagedCallersOnly` is used with `DllImport`. #114240
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2678830 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add HashSet check to Enumerable.Distinct #114237
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Disable, by default, `CLRConfig` settings on DAC builds. #114234
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Adjust for culture name normalization in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #114231
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • GetType: keep throwing same exceptions as .NET 8 #114228
    area-System.Reflection
  • Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [S.N.Quic] Observe exceptions in ResettableValueTaskSource #114226
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [HttpStress] Track unobserved exceptions #114225
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114224
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114223
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ILLink : Fix and a couple tweaks #114215
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [WASI] fix trimming #114211
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-wasi
  • [release/8.0] Revert disabling of tests for HTTP servers #114209
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Revert disabling of tests for HTTP servers #114207
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Tweaks to bridge testing #114203
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix for XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #114200
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix "MMM.yy" date parsing in German culture. #114169 #114194
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add FrozenDictionary.Create #114192
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Removing unnecessary comments #114190
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Test csproj fix #114186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: increase inline budget #114191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix bad merge of the interpreter code #114233
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove specific AZL sign certs #114131
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF][Android] Setup Android sample app for AOT/R2R perf testing #114117
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [mono][interpreter] Make nint and nuint work for interpreter simd intrinsics #114087
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Notify profiler about unloads of all class instances when module is unloaded #114107
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [clrinterp] Add support for ldc.r4, ldc.r8, ldc.i8 and ldstr #114201
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Generating Debug Info for interpreted bytecode #114139
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113449
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update branding to 9.0.5 #114162
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.16 #114161
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix VS div-by-0 in DacEnumerableHashTable code #113892
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • Improve error handling of unknown arch #114046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #113466
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert disabling of tests for HTTP servers #114196
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix Unable to load shared library 'jitinterface_x64' build error on linux/mac #114012
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fill out more SuperPMI cases for LoongArch64 and RISCV64 #114136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete more of ExceptionTracker code #114146
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: stop tracking TYP_I_IMPL locals in escape analysis #114130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move funclets invocation to code managers #114180
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Don't use `Delegate.Method` in ServiceDescriptor #114008
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #111408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ML-KEM: ImportFrom{Encrypted}Pem #114155
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Add support for building runtime with FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS on win-x86 #114157
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GC Bridge for Android scenarios #114184
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Implement breakpoint disassembly support for Intel APX #114120
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, apx
  • adding runtime-outerloop to build-analysis. #114164
    needs-area-label
  • Fix discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #114101
    area-System.Net.Http
  • RFC: Replace CodeManState with cache in EECodeInfo for x86. #114170
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Don't use incompatible LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH flags when using LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH #111990
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove reference / redistribution of externally provided packages in MSBuild tasks #113404
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.5
  • Pin the System.Memory package reference version in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #114173
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SslStreamDisposeTest for parallel handshake on Unix #114100
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Replace use of DAMT.All in ComponentModel with a more restricted set #114126
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    area-EnC-mono
  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Run static class constructor before pinvoke resolution #114020
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module #114172
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm coreclr] simplify build #114111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • [browser] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [TEST][CI] Azure Linux 3 experiments #114145
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Devirtualization and inlining for GVM #112353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
